main

Class SpriteHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.SpriteHandler

  • public class SpriteHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
    Date: Wednesday, April 21, 2016
    Class Description:

    Class defining Data Sets for the Sprites in game.
    Used to retrieve/remove and perform other operations such as logic execution with Sprites.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpriteHandler()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addToCurrentCast(Sprite... sprites)
      Adds Sprite to a separate list.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> getAllEnemyCast()
      Returns all enemies.
      static java.util.ArrayList<StageBlock> getAllStageElements()
      Returns all Stage Elements (StageBLock: Bricks and Tiles).
      static java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> getCurrentCast()
      To get the main Sprites: The Player (Mario), Stage Floor, Flag Pole.
      Only Mario is dynamic Sprite, rest are static.
      Sprites that do not belong to any of the Interfaces must be accessed from here.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> getEnemyCast()
      Returns only active (whose logic is currently being executed) enemies.
      static java.util.ArrayList<PlayerPower> getPlayerPowerList()
      Returns all powers in motion (executed by player).
      static java.util.HashSet<StageBlock> getStageElements()
      Returns only active (whose logic is currently being executed) StageBlocks (tiles and bricks).
      static void setAllStageElements(StageBlock... elements)
      Adds all Stage Elements (StageBLock: Bricks and Tiles) specified to global List (where both active and inactive StageBlocks exist).
      Activity (whose Logic is currently being executed) or inactivity is decided from stageZone property of StageBlock.
      static void setEnemyCast(Enemy... enemies)
      Adds all Enemies specified to global List (where both active and inactive Enemies exist).
      Activity (whose Logic is currently being executed) or inactivity is decided from stageZone property of Enemy.

      • SpriteHandler

        public SpriteHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentCast

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> getCurrentCast()
        To get the main Sprites: The Player (Mario), Stage Floor, Flag Pole.
        Only Mario is dynamic Sprite, rest are static.
        Sprites that do not belong to any of the Interfaces must be accessed from here.
        Returns:
        Main Sprites: The Player (Mario), Stage Floor, Flag Pole.

      • getAllEnemyCast

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> getAllEnemyCast()
        Returns all enemies. Whether active (whose logic is currently being executed) or inactive.
        Returns:
        List containing all Enemy Sprites.

      • getAllStageElements

        public static java.util.ArrayList<StageBlock> getAllStageElements()
        Returns all Stage Elements (StageBLock: Bricks and Tiles). Whether active (whose logic is currently being executed) or inactive.
        Returns:
        List containing active StageBlock Sprites.

      • getEnemyCast

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> getEnemyCast()
        Returns only active (whose logic is currently being executed) enemies.
        Returns:
        List containing active Enemy Sprites.

      • getPlayerPowerList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<PlayerPower> getPlayerPowerList()
        Returns all powers in motion (executed by player).
        Returns:
        All Powers executed by player.

      • getStageElements

        public static java.util.HashSet<StageBlock> getStageElements()
        Returns only active (whose logic is currently being executed) StageBlocks (tiles and bricks).
        Returns:
        Set containing active StageBlock Sprites.

      • setAllStageElements

        public static void setAllStageElements(StageBlock... elements)
        Adds all Stage Elements (StageBLock: Bricks and Tiles) specified to global List (where both active and inactive StageBlocks exist).
        Activity (whose Logic is currently being executed) or inactivity is decided from stageZone property of StageBlock.
        Parameters:
        elements - List containing StageBlock Sprites (must Implement StageBlock Interface).

      • setEnemyCast

        public static void setEnemyCast(Enemy... enemies)
        Adds all Enemies specified to global List (where both active and inactive Enemies exist).
        Activity (whose Logic is currently being executed) or inactivity is decided from stageZone property of Enemy.
        Parameters:
        enemies - List containing Enemy Sprites (must Implement Enemy Interface).

      • addToCurrentCast

        public static void addToCurrentCast(Sprite... sprites)
        Adds Sprite to a separate list. Only Sprites that do not implement any of the Interfaces shall be added.
        Parameters:
        sprites - List of Sprites to add to List (must extend Sprite abstract class).
